verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) I Will lift<WH5375> up my eyes<WH5869> to the mountains;<WH2022> From whence<WH370> shall my help<WH5828> come<WH935>?
My help<WH5828> [comes] from the Lord,<WH3068> Who made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth.<WH776>
He will not allow<WH5414> your foot<WH7272> to slip;<WH4131> He who keeps<WH8104> you will not slumber.<WH5123>
Behold,<WH2009> He who keeps<WH8104> Israel<WH3478> Will neither<WH3808> slumber<WH5123> nor<WH3808> sleep.<WH3462>
The Lord<WH3068> is your keeper;<WH8104> The Lord<WH3068> is your shade<WH6738> on your right<WH3225> hand.<WH3027>
The sun<WH8121> will not smite<WH5221> you by day,<WH3119> Nor<WH3808> the moon<WH3394> by night.<WH3915>
The Lord<WH3068> will protect<WH8104> you from all<WH3605> evil;<WH9563> He will keep<WH8104> your soul.<WH5315>
The Lord<WH3068> will guard<WH8104> your going<WH3318> out and your coming<WH935> in From this<WH6258> time<WH6258> forth and forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>
